text: A Region is the name for one of 25 areas into which the land is divided in Peru. Provinces of Peru * Name of the region (capital of the region) # Tumbes (Tumbes) # Piura (Piura) # Lambayeque (Chiclayo) # La Libertad (Trujillo) # Ancash (Huaraz) # Lima (Huacho) # Callao (Callao) # Ica (Ica) # Arequipa (Arequipa) # Moquegua (Moquegua) # Tacna (Tacna) # Cajamarca (Cajamarca) # Huánuco (Huánuco) # Pasco (Cerro de Pasco) # Junín (Huancayo) # Huancavelica (Huancavelica) # Ayacucho (Ayacucho) # Apurímac (Abancay) # Cusco (Cusco) # Puno (Puno) # Amazonas (Chachapoyas) # San Martín (Moyobamba) # Ucayali (Pucallpa) # Madre de Dios (Puerto Maldonado) # Loreto (Iquitos) * Lima Province (Lima) *
title: Regions of Peru
